original_text: He had made a bronze stage to stand on. It was 2.3 metres long, 2.3 metres wide and 1.4 metres high. He put it in the middle of the yard and he stood on it. Then he went down on his knees where all the Israelites could see him. He lifted up his hands towards the sky.
korean_text: 솔로몬이 일찍이 놋으로 대를 만들었으니 길이가 다섯 규빗이요 너비가 다섯 규빗이요 높이가 세 규빗이라 뜰 가운데에 두었더니 그가 그 위에 서서 이스라엘의 모든 회중 앞에서 무릎을 꿇고 하늘을 향하여 손을 펴고

sentences.original_text: He had made a bronze stage to stand on
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 서 있을 청동 단을 만들었습니다

sentences.original_text: He put it in the middle of the yard
Then he went down on his knees
where all the Israelites could see him
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 이스라엘 사람들이 그를 볼 수 있는 곳에서

sentences.original_text: He lifted up his hands towards the sky
